channel.title: Week Two of Vocab
channel.description:
Hello again, I have some more words this week which need to be made into sentences. Once again proper use of the word is needed along with correct punctuation and grammar.
The words this week include:
compassionate -n/adj- one who has empathy or tenderheartedness or being tenderhearted wrath -n/adj- intense anger/fury wiles -n- sly tricks; deceitful artifice; stratagem assertions -n- positive statements or declarations with no objective proof ignoramus -n- stupid person who lacks knowledge and experience
So those are the words this week they seem easy and its a short list. Thanks in advance, Phatal

item.title: Week Two of Vocab

item.description:
@phatal wrote:

Thanks everyone, more to come next week

item.title: Week Two of Vocab
item.dc:creator: @script_owned4 script_owned4
item.description:
@script_owned4 wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:4, topic:160966”][quote author=Silver Lining link=topic=219027.msg1901472#msg1901472 date=1196145373]
That was totally uncalled for Casey. Seriously, me… compassionate? Maybe in the early morning, but never otherwise.
[/quote]
I love you to Silver.[/quote]
I love you to Casey.

Well here are some of those sentences:

Casey is more compassionate than David.
Silver Lining’s wrath in the afternoon is like Jessica Simpson being murdered.
Moparisthebest’s wiles are a giant compared to Ron’s.
The trial with OJay Simpson resulted in an assemption.
Ignoramus people always result in being an oaf also.

Read full topic

item.title: Week Two of Vocab

item.description:
@phatal wrote:

Hello again, I have some more words this week which need to be made into sentences. Once again proper use of the word is needed along with correct punctuation and grammar.

The words this week include:

compassionate -n/adj- one who has empathy or tenderheartedness or being tenderhearted
wrath -n/adj- intense anger/fury
wiles -n- sly tricks; deceitful artifice; stratagem
assertions -n- positive statements or declarations with no objective proof
ignoramus -n- stupid person who lacks knowledge and experience

So those are the words this week they seem easy and its a short list.
Thanks in advance, Phatal
